name: Arcadea
description:
'''Arcadea''' is an American [[synth-metal]] [[supergroup (music)|supergroup]] from [[Atlanta]], formed in 2015 by [[Mastodon (band)|Mastodon]] drummer [[Brann Dailor]], and [[Gaylord (band)|Gaylord]] guitarist [[Core Atoms]].
Arcadea has released two albums on Relapse Records: their self-titled debut, ''Arcadea,'' in June 2017, and their follow-up ''The Exodus of Gravity,'' in August 2025.
